__e: - Hercules, what are you doing here?
Hercules... the strongest man ever to wear a skirt.
Hercules, I meant what I said.
You're Hercules, don't try to change that, not for me, not for the kids.
But being a friend of Hercules is not one of them.
I know I don't have to say this..., ...but it wasn't easy for Hercules to leave you.
And you still think Hercules is truly a strong man?
Yeah, Hercules is the only that who can see him... most of the time.
Next to my boy, Hercules is the best friend I've ever had.
So, how long have Hercules and you been friends?
But no one else hates Hercules and me as much as she does.
Do you really think Hercules and I would let that happen?
